task.title: Tator-Tot Breakfast Bake
task.shortdesc: Did you ever think of making tator tots for breakfast? Now is your chance to swap out hash browns for tator tots!

context.p: This breakfast bake is super easy and will please anyone lucky enough to try it!

ul.li: 1 lb ground breakfast sausage, no casings
2½ cups sharp cheddar cheese, shredded, divided
2 ½ cups Soymage vegan parmesan cheese
½ tsp freshly ground black pepper
3 TB freshly chopped parsley for garnish

step.cmd: Before you begin baking, turn on the oven and set the temperature to 350.
In a large skillet, cook sausage over medium heat. Once it is browned and completely cooked, layer it on a 9x13 baking pan. sprinkle the cheese over the sausage
In a large skillet, cook tofu hotdogs over medium heat. Once it is browned and completely cooked, layer it on a 9x13 baking pan. sprinkle the soymage vegan parmesan cheese over the hot dogs
In a large bowl, whisk together milk, eggs, pepper, onion powder, and salt. Once it is thoroughly mixed, layer it over sausage and cheese.
In a large bowl, whisk together almond milk, Ener-G egg replacer , pepper, onion powder, and salt. Once it is thoroughly mixed, layer it over tofu hot dogs and soymage vegan parmesan cheese.
Layer frozen tator tots on top of mixture in the baking dish
Place baking dish in the already preheated oven on the middle rack. Bake for 35 minutes
Top with additional cheese and crumbled bacon. Cook for another 10 minutes.
Top with additional soymage vegan parmesan cheese and crumbled seitan bacon. Cook for another 10 minutes
Let the dish cool for 10 minutes and then serve!
